summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning, repealing Ordinances 121208 and 121224 relating to a rezone of property located at 11332 Lake City Way Northeast, from Single Family 7200 (SF 7200) to Lowrise 2 Residential Commercial (L2-RC), withdrawing the Council's previous Findings of Fact, Conclusions of Law and Decision on this matter, and directing further action. (Petition of David Brown Associates for MMR Corporation, C.F. 305399, Application No. 2100337)
